TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Pakurung, title = Pakurung, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pakurung} }

S.FORM: alang Pakurung ga niya mki sku Tayto Keng atu Taitung Si, kwara sali buwan nya ga 106 buwan, 227 hi ku kwara s'uli tayan. s'uli tayan pinspngan Gyencumin ga 59% kyan ku 133 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahun sku pinspngan Gyencumin ga 41% kyan ku 94 hi nya. pinspung na linhuyan Gyencumin ga, Amis 33%, Paywan 3%, Bunun 3%, Rukay 12%, Puyuma 7%, binah lihuyan s'uli 2%. maki qu ngasal bziran. rhzyal kki'an tay 'llaw na Pakurung hya' ga bsilung. tay 'zil na Pakurung hya' ga rgyax. tay mkyahu' na Pakurung hya' ga llyung. tay mkraya' na Pakurung hya' ga llyung. tay mkyahu' na Pakurung hya' ga Kasavakan. tay 'llaw na Pakurung hya' ga Kalaluran. rekisi kayal kyokay qalang Pakurung ga ungat kyokay. ssquliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan qalang Pakurung ga ungat pqwasan biru. tuqi 'san basu kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbahu Ubuy qqmayh

alang Pakorong ga niya mki sko Tayto Keng ato Taitong Si, kwara sali bowan nya ga 106 bowan, 227 hi ko kwara s'oli tayan. s'oli tayan pinspngan Gyencomin ga 59% kyan ko 133 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahon sko pinspngan Gyencomin ga 41% kyan ko 94 hi nya. pinspong na linhoyan Gyencomin ga, Amis 33%, Paywan 3%, Bonon 3%, Rokay 12%, Poyoma 7%, binah lihoyan s'oli 2%. maki qo ngasal bziran. rhzyal kki'an tay 'llaw na Pakorong hya' ga bsilong. tay 'zil na Pakorong hya' ga rgyax. tay mkyaho' na Pakorong hya' ga llyong. tay mkraya' na Pakorong hya' ga llyong. tay mkyaho' na Pakorong hya' ga Kasavakan. tay 'llaw na Pakorong hya' ga Kalaloran. rekisi kayal kyokay qalang Pakorong ga ongat kyokay. ssqoliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan qalang Pakorong ga ongat pqwasan biro. toqi 'san baso kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbaho Uboy qqmayh
